Class ServerLib

java.lang.Object
ServerLib
public class ServerLib extends Object
Main library class for Project 3.

Defines a set of functions for accessing Cloud services (eg., startVM), performing front-end tier operations (eg., acceptConnection, parseRequest), and doing middle-tier operations (eg., processRequest).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ServerLib.Handle
    Opaque handle to client connection

    Frontend operation to get the next client and parse its request (may block and wait if needed); this is just acceptConnection + parseRequest.

    Frontend operation to get the length of the queue at this Server.

    Cloud Service returns status of a VM; Can be NonExistent, Booting, Running, or Ended.

    Method returns time of day (in hours) for simulation [0-24)

    Frontend operation to interrupt any blocked acceptConnection or getNextRequest call.

    Frontend operation to parse the request from the client connection.
    void
    processRequest(Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request r)
    Middle tier operation to process and send back reply for the given request using the default DB.
    void
    processRequest(Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request r, Cloud.DatabaseOps DB)
    Middle tier operation to process and send back reply for the given request using the specified DB; Not implemented -- default DB always used
    boolean
    register_frontend()
    alias for registerFrontend()
    boolean
    registerFrontend()
    Frontend operation to register this Server with the load balancer and start receiving client requests; returns true on success.
    void
    shutDown()
    Unregister frontend (if needed) and shut down server queue; Use this to allow Server to exit cleanly.
    int
    startVM()
    Cloud Service to start a new "VM", which will run the Server class after booting; returns new VM id.
    boolean
    unregister_frontend()
    alias for unregisterFrontend()
    boolean
    unregisterFrontend()
    Frontend operation to unregister from load balancer and stop receiving any more requests; returns true on success.

    • getNextRequest

      public Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request getNextRequest()
      Frontend operation to get the next client and parse its request (may block and wait if needed); this is just acceptConnection + parseRequest.

      Frontend operation to interrupt any blocked acceptConnection or getNextRequest call.

      public void shutDown()
